title: BRIEF-Genesis Land Development Says Entered Sale Agreement To Buy $20.5 Mln Vendor Take-Back Mortgage From Limited Partnership Land Pool
text:
BRIEF-Genesis Land Development Says Entered Sale Agreement To Buy $20.5 Mln Vendor Take-Back Mortgage From Limited Partnership Land Pool

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Sep 19, 2019 19:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Genesis Land Development Says Entered Sale Agreement To Buy $20.5 Mln Vendor Take-Back Mortgage From Limited Partnership Land Pool Sept 19 (Reuters) - Genesis Land Development Corp : * GENESIS ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO PURCHASE VENDOR TAKE-BACK MORTGAGE FROM LIMITED PARTNERSHIP LAND POOL (2007) FOR $22 MILLION * GENESIS LAND DEVELOPMENT- ENTERED INTO SALE AGREEMENT TO BUY A $20.5 MILLION VENDOR TAKE-BACK MORTGAGE FROM LIMITED PARTNERSHIP LAND POOL

BRIEF-Genesis Land Development Says Entered Sale Agreement To Buy $20.5 Mln Vendor Take-Back Mortgage From Limited Partnership Land Pool
